item.title: Presenting a poster at TAGC2020
item.author: frederick.boehm@gmail.com (Frederick J. Boehm)
item.description: I have the opportunity to present a poster at The Allied Genetics Conference (TAGC) 2020. I’ve posted both a pdf of the poster and a mp4 narrated video tour of the poster here. I’d love to address your questions and hear your suggestions in the Q & A session on Thursday, April 30, at 1:30pm Eastern Time. My poster number is 1333A. (Last modified: 2020-04-27 15:49:12)
